nodes.text: Asharl panthers were large, aggressive felines native to the frigid planet Ilum in the Unknown Regions. They lived in Ilum's Northern and Southern hemispheres.[source?]

Asharl panthers had broad, earless heads, a pronounced brow ridge, and a short, blunt snout. They had a pair of tentacle-like sensory organs on their shoulders. They lived in family groups of two to four. They also had smooth, dense fur, colored in shades of white, blue, and gray, that held their body warmth in. They were two to three meters long, and around one meter tall at the shoulders. Their eyes were golden in color.
Asharl panthers were first mentioned in Nexus of Power, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016.
